attributes.title: This app is so bad
attributes.review: The app is slow and useless bc trump is the worst president and his app looks like a 12 year old made my flo period app has a better interface than this

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: Within seconds of downloading this app my phone exploded. I think it was overwhelmed by the high amount ignorant energy radiating from this app. Anyways had to by a new phone, this app is not worth it.

attributes.title: Bad App
attributes.review: This app keeps crashing my phone and It doesn’t even work it just stays on a loading screen. You need to fix this app because it is TERRIBLE and I mean TERRIBLE

attributes.title: No❤️
attributes.review: This app is HORRIBLE, it’s very glitchy and doesn’t work well, and when I saw the orange- I mean our president I almost died, it was the ugliest thing I have ever seen. I hate this app and the president, who is a racist and a rapist.

trump has proven to be racist, homophobic, xenophobic, sexist, and classist. also he is a CHILD RAPIST!!! this app does nothing but perpetuate his idiotic beliefs. anyone w morals would NOT support him. he is a disgusting human being who needs to be in jail!!! the app also lags and drains data✨🧚

attributes.title: Just bad
attributes.review: I downloaded it took weeks, I’m am so mad that it did not download fast and it caused a death. Unfortunately my great great great grandfather passed away he loved trump and   I blame him for the death this app is terrible.

attributes.title: horrible
attributes.review: ABSOLUTELY HORRIBLE, not only was the app glitchy it brought viruses it my phone! i’m disappointed on how the app behaves, it has brought me nothing but viruses and problems, DO NOT get this app i’m warning you!!!!🤬

attributes.title: I Hate this app
attributes.review: Ok.. so first of all it takes for ever to download.i saw so many disturbing pictures of a 🍊my eyes!!!😤in conclusion this app is horrible and you should take it off of the App Store 😚

attributes.title: horrible app
attributes.review: i experiences a lot of issues regarding this app, as i thought that it would be a place to know the viewpoint of the president but the app was lagging, crashed multiple times, and after typing in my number, throughout the entire night i was getting phone calls and messages that i hadn’t gotten ever before. so anyways stan charli for clear skin🧚‍♂️

attributes.title: No❤️.
attributes.review: This is probably the worst app to ever exist. As soon as i downloaded it, my phone glitched. Then Trumps face popped up and my phone just broke. I had to get a new one and download it just to write this review.
